disobedience.question: Did I use my words to belittle the Church?

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the good things in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted your good fortune in life, forgetting to acknowledge its source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I give thanks to God for all things without taking them for granted, recognizing that they come from His providence rather than my own efforts or accomplishments?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished others would lose their blessings, so I wouldn't feel envious of them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I felt envious of others' accomplishments, wishing they would lose their success?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I felt resentful when seeing others' accomplishments, wishing they wouldn't have achieved them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use words that were vulgar or inappropriate when interacting with others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with vulgar or inappropriate language through online interactions or in - person conversations
through online interactions or in - person conversations
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language through online interactions or in-person conversations, violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with words that were unbecoming or hurtful
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others with words that were unbecoming or hurtful, thereby violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and rejecting the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and a rejection of the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking in ways that show a lack of self - control
in ways that show a lack of self - control
to your own needs and desires
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking in ways that show a lack of self-control, especially when it comes to your own needs and desires?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I squandered financial resources entrusted to me, putting the needs of others, especially my family, at risk?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: for indulging in leisure activities at the expense of my financial obligations or family needs
at the expense of my financial obligations or family needs
of my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively and wastefully risked resources entrusted to me for indulging in leisure activities at the expense of my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: through excessive and thoughtless gaming activities
prodigality.question: Have I wasted money that should have been used for my family's necessities through excessive and thoughtless gaming activities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
through casual conversations at work or with friends
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through casual conversations at work or with friends?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing private affairs, even if what I shared was true, and thereby causing harm to others through my words?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private conversations or details about others
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private conversations or details about others, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I intentionally engage in work on a Sunday, a day reserved for rest, worship, and prayer?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impiety.question: Did I work on Sundays when it could have been avoided, potentially undermining my family's day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
